entry.en: Highlight the differentiated advantages of your technology and services compared to competitors.
entry.zh: 突出您的技术和服务与竞争对手的差异化优势。

entry.en: Technological leadership: High-frequency trading systems, intraday trading models, and algorithm optimization capabilities.
entry.zh: 技术领先性：如高频交易系统、日内交易模型、算法优化能力。

entry.en: Risk management: Showcase your emphasis on risk control (e.g., max drawdown in four years not exceeding 20%).
entry.zh: 风险管理能力：展示您对风险控制的重视（如四年最大回撤不超过20%）。

entry.en: Data-driven decisions: How big data analysis and machine learning improve strategies.
entry.zh: 数据驱动决策：如何通过大数据分析和机器学习提升策略。

entry.en: Global perspective: How dual offices in Hong Kong and Shanghai support both global and localized investment strategies.
entry.zh: 全球视野：香港和上海的双办公室如何支持全球化和本地化的投资策略。
